title: Slow Computer Performance
description: Speed up a slow laptop or desktop computer.

steps.title: Restart Your Computer
steps.instruction: Save your work and restart your computer. This clears memory and stops unnecessary background processes.

steps.title: Check Task Manager for Resource Usage
steps.instruction: Press Ctrl+Shift+Esc to open Task Manager. Check CPU, Memory, and Disk usage. Close applications using excessive resources.

steps.title: Disable Startup Programs
steps.instruction: Task Manager → Startup tab → Right-click unnecessary programs → Disable. This prevents them from slowing down boot time.

steps.title: Run Disk Cleanup
steps.instruction: Search for 'Disk Cleanup', select C: drive, check all boxes including 'System files', and click OK to free up space.

steps.title: Check for Malware
steps.instruction: Run Windows Security (Windows Defender) full scan: Settings → Update & Security → Windows Security → Virus & threat protection → Quick scan.
